title: The Sausages
creator_credit: Tim Burstall, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
brief_description: Sebastian the Fox becomes involved with a tramp who is cooking sausages on a camp fire. The fox steals the sausages and is pursued by the tramp and finally caught. Not to be outdone, Sebastian sneaks more sausages while the tramp is not looking and runs happily away into the bush.
